entry.title: Sold-To Party: not updated automatically for Some incident while creating Solman incident
entry.content:
Dear All,

Basically Sold-To Party: updated automatically when i create incident in ITSM. but Some incident its blank 

Please advise how to correct the error.

entry.title: Property calendarWeekNumbering does not exist in Element sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

after system upgrade, we have an error in various applications related to DatePicker object :

abap.js:64 Assertion failed: ManagedObject.apply: encountered unknown setting "calendarWeekNumbering" for class "sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month" (value:"Default")

We are on SAPUI5 1.71.75, and we have upgraded the SAPUI5 component from SAP_UI 754 0006 to SAP_UI 754 0008.

Applications works fine from WebIde and also in the landscape system that are still not upgraded.

Instead If we launch the application from Fiori Launchpad we have the issue.

Do you have some advice ? 

Thanks

Massimo

entry.title: Soamanager table storing proxy configuration
entry.content:
Helle All,
Could You tell me in which table I could find configuration of web services proxy?
I need to scan all defined proxy and identify old proxies but due to it's number, this activity is tedious.
It will be much easier to check specific table.

Kind Regards
Łukasz Karabowicz

entry.title: HR Mini master employee work schedule not showing in CM25.
entry.content:
Hi, I need help with HR mini master integration with Capacity planning board.

My goal for integrating HR master with capacity is to do capacity planning at the individual labor level based on their availability and qualifications. Should be able to assign individual labor from the pooled capacity to a particular Process order based on their work schedule and qualification in CM25.

I have configured the HR mini master, maintained qualifications and Planning work time (INFO TYPE= 007), the expectation is that this work time will show in CM25 for capacity planning based on availability. 

The employees are assigned to the work centers under Capacity HRMS. I can see these employees in CM25 using overall Profile "SAPSFCG005", but I do not see their work schedule, this is the problem. 

I'm attaching the screenshot of the configuration and CM25.

entry.title: Authorization trace filter for single object ?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

is there a way to trace only a single object (like S_TABU_DIS) over several users, to check when/if this authorization was used and on which transaction/process?

In STAUTHTRACE you can only filter object, but only for a completed trace (where all objects were traced).
But I dont want to trace everything, so tracing only with filter for object.

thank you.

entry.title: Im BW mit Routine Hashtag erstetzen
entry.content:
Hallo,

ich versuche '#' im String bei einer Feldzuweisung mit REPLACE zu ersetzen. leider wird '#' offenbar nicht als Zeichen interpretiert und nicht ersetzt.

Hat jemand eine Idee, wie ich hier weiterkommen?

Veiel Dank 

Johannes Borst-Rachor

entry.title: Error while extracting data: DataSource 0CO_PC_ACT_02, package 000000 Message no. RODPS_SAPI009
entry.content:
When I try to extract data from S4HANA using 0CO_PC_ACT_02 using ABAP code in the FISCPER selection (current period), after getting some data, the dataload job ends with an error in the source system message. I see only msg below, nothing more.

Error while extracting data: DataSource 0CO_PC_ACT_02, package 000000

Message no. RODPS_SAPI009

Please advise me how I can proceed here, as it is essential for us. Thank you.

entry.title: sap netwaver nord is missing in spro
Unable to replicate data from BW 7.5 DSO to Datasphere
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to replicate a specific set of data from BW 7.5 (On-Premise) to SAP Datasphere. We have the connection to BW setup via the cloud connector but we cannot see any of the DSOs when creating a dataflow. The client does not intend to have DPA or BW Bridge.

How can we replicate the data directly to Datasphere (without migration to BW Bridge or use of DPA)? The record counts to be replicated can be in excess of 100M records

Thanks

entry.title: SAP Fiori Elements Funktion Import Copy Row
entry.content:
I have a Fiori Elements app with a list report page and an object page. When I click the Copy one Row button on the list report page, a new row with the same values as the selected row is created. I am then automatically redirected to the object page, where I can edit the data in the new row. However, when I click Cancel, the new row is still displayed in the list even though I have not saved the data. How can I prevent this behavior?

  METHOD /iwbep/if_mgw_appl_srv_runtime~execute_action.
    DATA : ls_parameter        TYPE /iwbep/s_mgw_name_value_pair,
           ls_zleiter_ausnahme TYPE zleiter_ausnahme,
           ls_result           TYPE zleiter_ausnahme,
           ls_entity           TYPE  zcl_zodata_leiter_aus_mpc=>ts_leiterausnahmen,
           lt_entityset        TYPE zcl_zodata_leiter_aus_mpc=>tt_leiterausnahmen.

    IF iv_action_name = 'CopyRow'.

      "read parameters
      READ TABLE it_parameter INTO ls_parameter WITH KEY name = 'LA_ID'.
      READ TABLE it_parameter INTO DATA(ls_keys_app) WITH KEY name = 'APP_ID'.
      ls_zleiter_ausnahme-la_id = ls_parameter-value.
      ls_zleiter_ausnahme-app_id = ls_keys_app-value.


      "select new values
      "do you know - even if you haven't yet committed the changes,
      "system will return new data
      "search 'transaction isolation levels' to read more on this
      SELECT SINGLE * FROM zleiter_ausnahme
        WHERE  la_id = @LS_zleiter_ausnahme-la_id AND app_id = @LS_zleiter_ausnahme-app_id
        INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF @LS_result .
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        SELECT MAX( la_id ) FROM zleiter_ausnahme INTO @DATA(lv_id).
        ADD 1 TO lv_id.
        ls_result-la_id = lv_id.
        ls_result-la_datum = sy-datum.
        ls_result-la_aenderer = sy-uname.
     MODIFY zleiter_ausnahme FROM ls_result.

        DATA: ls_entityset LIKE LINE OF lt_entityset.

*      ls_entityset-aenderer = ls_result-la_aenderer.
        ls_entityset-aenderer = sy-uname.
        ls_entityset-bemerkung = ls_result-la_bemerkung.
*      ls_entityset-date = ls_result-la_datum.
        ls_entityset-date = sy-datum.
        ls_entityset-datefrom = ls_result-la_datum_von.
        ls_entityset-dateto = ls_result-la_datum_bis.
        ls_entityset-int2 = ls_result-la_id.
        ls_entityset-kostl = ls_result-la_kostl.
        ls_entityset-ktr = ls_result-la_ktr.
        ls_entityset-mandt = ls_result-mandt.
        ls_entityset-username = ls_result-la_nutzer.
        ls_entityset-int1 = ls_result-app_id.
        ls_entityset-app_description = ls_result-app_bezeichnung.

      APPEND ls_entityset TO lt_entityset.

* call methos copy_data_to_ref and export entity set data
        copy_data_to_ref( EXPORTING is_data = ls_entityset

                CHANGING cr_data = er_data ).
      ELSE.
        "Fehlerbehandlung - Quellrecord nicht gefunden
        RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE /iwbep/cx_mgw_busi_exception
          EXPORTING
            textid  = /iwbep/cx_mgw_busi_exception=>business_error
            message = 'Quelldatensatz nicht gefunden'.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF .
**TRY.
*CALL METHOD SUPER->/IWBEP/IF_MGW_APPL_SRV_RUNTIME~EXECUTE_ACTION
**  EXPORTING
**    iv_action_name          =
**    it_parameter            =
**    io_tech_request_context =
**  IMPORTING
**    er_data                 =
*    .
** CATCH /iwbep/cx_mgw_busi_exception .
** CATCH /iwbep/cx_mgw_tech_exception .
**ENDTRY.
  ENDMETHOD.

entry.title: implement a value help for a field in the list report page using a second OData entity set
entry.content:
Dear SAP Team,

I have a Fiori Elements app with a list report page and an object page. I am trying to implement a value help for a field in the list report page using a second OData entity set. I have adjusted the annotations accordingly, but the value help is not working as expected. Can I get some help on how to correctly set up a second OData entity set for the value help in a Fiori Elements app?

ZCL_ZODATA_LEITER_AUS_DPC_EXT WERTEHILFEUSERNA_GET_ENTITYSET

Best Regards,
Amir Alhamoud

entry.title: 如何实时监控(Hana某表的)删除事件 How to runtime-subscribe to deletion events for a ERP​ table
entry.content:
您好, 我们有个安全与容灾项目, 需要实时的监控某些表的删除事件,  以实现对高敏感业务操作的实时预警和自动处理; 

现在的问题是: 我们不知道要如何才能订阅到 相关ERP表中某行记录的删除事件 (有PrimayKey主键),  希望SAP能提供这方面的方案建议和指导; 

 

We would like to know how to subscribe to deletion events for specific rows in related ​ERP​ tables (with a ​Primary Key). ​SAP​ is requested to provide solution suggestions and implementation guidance on this topic.

entry.title: SAP note implementation steps
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am implementing snote 3631594(parent note) which is having 28 correction notes (prerequisite notes), my question is do we need to implement all 28 prerequisite notes first or we just need to implement parent note 3631594 and all the prerequisite notes will be implemented automatically?Please help on this its urgent. Thank you!

entry.title: Process chain cannot be activated, deleted, executed
entry.content:
Hi experts,

We have a process chain, similar to other ones and not modified in QUAL environment for last 2 years.

When executed through metachain, it appeared as yellow in process monitoring, but never triggered actually. In table RSPC_PROCESS_LOG, it appeared with blank status.

We tried to execute end of previous process, run via SM37 FM API chain start, activate again, transport it again from DEV system.

But every action failed and got out of time. Even trying to delete it from QUAL system got a TIMEOUT dump.

 

What can we do ?

Thanks

entry.title: OData Service: “No system alias found for service” after transport to QA – why is “LOCAL” missing?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’ve created an OData service that reads data from a custom table and provides PDF downloads. Everything is fully implemented and working in our development system (DEV). The service also runs fine in the Gateway Client (/IWFND/GW_CLIENT).

After transporting it to QA, I’m getting the following error in the Gateway Client:

500 – No system alias found for service

When I checked the service in QA via /IWFND/MAINT_SERVICE, I noticed that there is no system alias “LOCAL” defined at all.

This confused me because in DEV the service is assigned to the alias “LOCAL”, but in QA it doesn’t exist.

What also makes it strange:

Other OData services in QA and PROD are working fine—even though they also don’t have any system alias assigned. So the system somehow works without explicitly having “LOCAL” configured.

My questions:

Why does “LOCAL” exist in DEV but not in QA/PROD?

Shouldn’t this be consistent?

How is it possible that other OData services work without any system alias at all?

Is the system using some kind of implicit local alias?

What is the correct way to fix this issue for my new OData service?

Do I need to create the alias manually in QA, or is there a better approach?

How can I make sure that existing productive OData services won’t be affected by this configuration?

entry.title: It's possible to perform a reorg in all tables at the same time? - SAP ASE
entry.content:

Is it possible for you to provide us with a script to perform reorganization on all tables? Or must it be done one by one?
